full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Beneficiation and Metallurgical Testing Services

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000080380

**Publication Date:** May 29, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** June 13, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

### Description of the Requirement

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires beneficiary and metallurgical testing services for apatite-bearing carbonatite tailings. The work involves two phases, with the first phase focusing on recovering apatite from a 300 kg tailings sample. The recovered apatite will undergo hydrometallurgy to produce phosphoric acid and a high-purity REE carbonate. The high-purity REE carbonate will be used in downstream processing to produce individual REE separates.

**Selection Criteria:**

To be considered, interested suppliers must demonstrate the following:

* Capability to accept a minimum 2-ton apatite-bearing carbonatite tailings sample
* Ability to perform metallurgical tests at their usual place of business, including:
	+ Crushing and grinding of a 2-ton sample of apatite-bearing tailings
	+ Beneficiation of apatite-bearing carbonatite tailings using magnetic separation, heavy liquid separation, flotation, and chemical methods
	+ Recovery and extraction of REE to form REE carbonates
* Experience performing the above tests on sample sizes of at least 2 tons within the past five years
* A proposed resource with a university degree in a relevant field and a minimum of two years of experience providing scientific analysis of test results

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Revised World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Justification for Pre-identified Supplier:**

Saskatchewan
